info.name: BikeDoctor API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for BikeDoctor Backend - Bike Service Booking Platform

Base URL: http://localhost:8001

Main Prefix: /bikedoctor

body.raw:
{
  "Servicelist": [
    {
      "_id": "service_id_here",
      "dealerId": "dealer_id_here",
      "name": "General Service",
      "price": 500
    }
  ],
  "bullet_points": ["Oil change", "Brake check"],
  "additonal_options": [],
  "bike_id": "bike_id_here",
  "area": "andheri",
  "city": "mumbai",
  "address": "123 Main Street, Andheri West",
  "description": "Please service my bike",
  "estimated_cost": 500,
  "additonal_data_moveable": []
}

{
  "user_id": "user_id_here",
  "dealer_id": "dealer_id_here",
  "services": ["service_id_1", "service_id_2"],
  "additionalServices": ["additional_service_id"],
  "userBike_id": "user_bike_id_here",
  "address": "123 Main Street",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "area": "Andheri",
  "latitude": 19.076,
  "longitude": 72.8777,
  "scheduled_date": "2024-01-15",
  "scheduled_time": "10:00 AM",
  "description": "Please service my bike",
  "pickupAndDropId": "pickup_drop_id_here"
}

{
  "pickup_address": "123 Main Street, Andheri",
  "drop_address": "456 Second Street, Bandra",
  "pickup_latitude": 19.1136,
  "pickup_longitude": 72.8697,
  "drop_latitude": 19.0596,
  "drop_longitude": 72.8295,
  "booking_id": "booking_id_here"
}
